website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design fits in any purse or backpack. Durable construction holds up to frequent use.
pros: Compatible with any micro USB cord but comes with its own
cons: There’s a blue LED power light that some people find a bit distracting and too bright

customer_reviews.title: No more winter nosebleeds
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier has saved my nose and sinuses this winter. My office is very dry in the winter so I normally end up having a lot of nosebleeds. So far I haven't had any thanks to this humidifier! The spring did get a little stuck a few months in to using it which reduced the mist but I was able to fix it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but works well
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Easy to operate n clean. MUST use distilled water. My only complaint is the small amount of water vapor it puts out. Very appreciate to it’s size tho n much easier to carry than my table top model.
customer_reviews.author: texastrue

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many comments on this cute little thing! I use it in the car mostly but also take it into work for use at my desk. It has definitely helped on the long commute to keep my sinuses and hands releived of the dry air. I think it goes through about 8oz in 4 hours (I used a small glass at work and refilled it at least once.)
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Toler

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a week
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had it a full week and it no longer works. It was working fine for the first few days then one day the mist gradually lessened over the course of a couple hours before totally ceasing. Tried cleaning it as instructed but it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a Month
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a month. Even when it was working, there will be water around. Make sure you cover up your furniture or floor. Looks good but disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and work well on the plane. Only drawback is the blue LED light. Very bright and wish there was an option to turn it off. Overall satisfied and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: YSK23

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for couple of weeks then stops. Barely puts out any moisture, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Lasts more than 8hrs so I can go to sleep without being worried of gettung an empty container.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: quiet cool mist
customer_reviews.text: As a singer I travel frequently, I"m in dry hotels and my son recently became diagnosed with asthma again so it was with great relief this walked in the house. I'd experienced another similar to this, that one broke. Fill it up with water, plug it in and let it go. The steam is a huge help for those who use their voice and to keep the upper respiratory flowing for those with colds.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walbridge

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this between her vocal classes. She says it helps soothe her vocal chords. I love the auto off feature. She loves the portability. It was a win win for us!
customer_reviews.author: Streby Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It serves me well in my small apartment & holds plenty of water.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Pat

product_meta.title: Portable USB Humidifier Multifunctional Portable Mini Humidifier USB Cool Mist Humidifier with Water Bottle Premium Humidifying Unit with Whisper-Quiet Operation Automatic Shut-Off
product_meta.description:
Why do you need Jaywayne Portable Humidifiers?

- When working, the mist output is 40 ml / hour, which meets your humidification needs.

- Can be used as a car humidifier when traveling.

- Ultra-quiet operation, running noises like blooming sound.

- There is more mist, and the new 12-hour automatic shutdown function.

- Ultra-long three-foot USB cable, universal with mobile phone USB cables.

- Easy to use, just put the humidifier in the water source and wait for the filter element to absorb moisture for about 3 minutes.

- Use the car charger port, power bank or computer USB port power, and then turn on the switch to start using! That's it!




Easy to Use

Only 4 steps to use the humidifier with a few seconds.

1. Pour in water.

2. Insert cotton bar.

3. Plug in USB cable.

4. Turn on after 3 minutes.






Take It Anywhere

- Car

- Bedroom

- Office

- Babyroom

- Study

- Hotel




Perfect Size for Any Bottles

Small size and perfect for any bottles, so you can take it anywhere, anytime.

Product Size: 170*74*74mm

N.W./G.W:122g/184g

Voltage:DC 5V

Power:2W
feature_bullets: [Portable Mini Humidifier] Small and lightweight design ensure you could take it wherever you go. This cool mist humidifier is perfect for your bedroom, office, desktop, baby room, yoga, car, or travel. 12 hours auto shut off design is very safe for you. Personal humidifier is could e charged through USB cable access with varies device.

[Cool Mist Humidifier] With mist volume of 40ml/h, the cool mist humidifier give your air moist and your skin will not get dry. Power Saving design with only 2W/h power consumption. Mini humidifier is also your desks, bedrooms ideal choice.

[Compatible with Any Containers] Cool Mist Small Humidifier is very friendly and bring you huge convenience! Full water bottle could provide 5 hours of the humidification time to meet the needs of long-distance travel.

[Silent in Use]: Ultrasonic humidifier is equipped with advanced mute technology with noise less than 15db which could offers you a comfortable and silent experience. Perfect for baby rooms. Package includes:1x Mini Humidifier, 1xWater Bottle, 1xUSB cable, 1xUser Manual, 1xCotton Bat. For filter wick, refer to ASIN B0762KLFFN.
100% SATISFACTION SERVICE: This premium portable personal humidifiers carries 100% satisfaction. Any problems please feel free to contact us. Add to Cart Now!
